description: It's not easy when you finish a school and can't get a job in the field of your study. The same thing happened to this guy. He finished a business school but ended up working at a factory as a regular worker. His salary was terrible even for the backward region he was from. That was the main reason why he decided to move to Prague. He managed to get a nice deal on a flat and now he needed a job to pay the rent. I was horny so the guy got a nice job behind a desk. He was pretty happy about it until he found out about our mediation fee. The guy was totally broke. He said yes to my dirty offers without thinking twice. Soon my cock was choking his beautiful mouth and stretching his super tight asshole. He wanted my money no matter what I did to him.
title: Dirty Scout 213
